root.text: {{name}}, I'd like to talk to you.
I don't know if you're aware, but Alex has told us all not to talk to you.
And he's threatening everyone who doesn't follow him.
Can I trust you? I don't want us to stop being friends.

choices.text: Thank you very much for being my friend.
No. And I have no interest in gaining your trust.

thanks.text: Let's exchange our phones and social media passwords.
As a gesture of friendship and trust.
In the past, they shook hands with an open wound for sharing blood to each other.

exchange.text: (You write the passwords through your phones)

exchange2.text: Perfect. Best Friends (smiles from ear to ear).

dont.text: If you don't trust me I can't trust you either.
I'm sorry, but I can't talk to you then.
I don't want Alex to have it in for me.

reject.text: I don't have a choice then, so I'll stop talking to you.
I don't want to take any risks.

late.text: I'm going to class now, it's late already, we'll get scolded for sure.

root.text: (His face gesture changes once he sees you. Turns his head and looks other way)
(With a smile on his face he looks at you and starts laughing)
Looks like someone has taken yesterday's picture.
